text: Today on the West Coast, we've got clean 2 ft @ 8s NW swell with fresh 17 mph E winds. Balephetrish and Balevullin Bay are both looking good, especially from 09:03 to 15:55. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 2 ft @ 12s WNW with light 8 mph ENE winds, making it a poor day for surf. On the day after, Dunaverty shows some promise with 2 ft @ 6s NE, but overall, it's still a bit lackluster. Best: today.
